archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.3.6: Office equipment should be monitored (e.g. using intrusion detection, network discovery and mapping tools) on a regular basis to help identify tampering (e.g. removal of hard disks or memory), misuse (e.g. unauthorised printing) and theft.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
